long_description: Designed for use with Kinetic fluid bike trainers, the inRide Heart Rate Monitor measures your heart rate and shares the data with your iPhone or iPad via its Bluetooth Smart(TM) connection. The Kinetic Heart Rate Monitor is compatible with the iPhone 4S, 5 series, iPad 3, 4 and Air, and iPod Touch 5th generation. The heart rate strap will also work with other 3rd party apps using Bluetooth Smart for device pairing. Post-workout file sharing allows you to upload training data to your favorite website or email files to a remote coach. Requires the free Kinetic inRide app; Kinetic fluid bike trainers sold separately.
